member.name: T:Canopee.Common.JsonObject
member.summary: This class represent a json structure as an object, and allow some features as load from a text file, a JsonDocument, and write a json to a file. This class was created to manage issues on managing configuration file easily and dynamically, but it is also useful for exchange between purpose.

member.summary: Load a file that contains a json structure into a

member.summary: Load a JsonDocument object into a
member.param: the document to load

member.summary: Load all child JsonElement from this element into a
member.param: the root JsonElement to load from

member.name: M:Canopee.Common.JsonObject.GetObjectFromJsonProperty(System.Text.Json.JsonProperty)
member.summary: Get the C# object from a JsonProperty depending on the JsonValueKind : - Number will be converted into short, int, long, single, double, decimal (test are made in this order) - boolean will be return as boolean - null or undefined as null - array as a list of object, and each element will be converted in the C# corresponding object - object will be converted to a - string to string The associated key will be the name of the json property, respecting the case
member.param: the JsonProperty to convert to C# object
member.returns: an object that correspond to the JsonValueKind of the JsonProperty

member.name: M:Canopee.Common.JsonObject.GetObjectFromJsonElement(System.Text.Json.JsonElement@)
member.summary: Get the corresponding C# object from a JsonElement depending on its JsonValueKind : - Number will be converted into short, int, long, single, double, decimal (test are made in this order) - boolean will be return as boolean - null or undefined as null - array as a list of object, and each element will be converted in the C# corresponding object - object will be converted to a - string to string The associated key will be the name of the json property, respecting the case

member.summary: Get the value of a property stored in the JsonObject in the type expected.

If the property name doesn't exist in this
